## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/once-flag">llvm::once&#95;flag</a> structure.

This type is modeled after std::once&#95;flag to use with <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abc08edd3ca31ae54f1a794719c4c153c">llvm::call&#95;once</a>. This structure must be used as an opaque object. It is a struct to force autoinitialization and behave like std::once&#95;flag.

Definition at line 67 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threading-h">Threading.h</a>.
